com.hv15.aperi

Class DeviceDetailFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Fragment
      • com.hv15.aperi.DeviceDetailFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentCallbacks, ComponentCallbacks2, WifiP2pManager.ConnectionInfoListener, View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class DeviceDetailFragment
extends Fragment
implements WifiP2pManager.ConnectionInfoListener
    A fragment that manages a particular peer and allows interaction with device i.e. setting up network connection and transferring data.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description

      A simple server socket that accepts connection and writes some data on the stream.
